text: Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ guizbangɨra uabɨ uan ziamɨn pɨn arɨgha, kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, kɨ Bosran nguibam bar pazavɨram a gasɨghasigham, eghtɨ a danganir kɨnimɨn otogham. Eghtɨ igharaz darazir gumazamiziba bizir kɨ Bosran amizir kaba baregh, me atiatingɨva, dɨgavir kuram damigham. Egh me dɨpov akar asuibar Bosran mɨkɨmam. Ezɨ gumazamizir kaba uari akar kurabar uan apanibav kɨmamin dughiamɨn, me kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, ‘Ia Bosra ikuvizɨ moghɨn ia ikuvigham.’ Kɨ Idomian nguibabara bar dagh asɨghasigham, eghtɨ da ikuvigh mamaghɨra ikiam.”
